div.h2: TrackerDash is a customisable analytics dashboard server that is written in Python.
To find out more about how to configure your TrackerDash server and get going click here.
div.p: TrackerDash makes extensive use of Highcharts JS which is licenced under creative commons. While under creative commons you are free to use TrackerDash and HighCharts software for non-commercial purposes, running this software might conflict with their Licencing terms, which can be found here.
